hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdul-Malik bin Sa'eed said:"I heard Abu Humaid and Abu Usaid say: 'The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "When any one of you enters the Masjid, let him say: 'Allahumma aftahli abwaba rahmatik (O Allah, open to me the gates of your mercy). And when he leaves let him say: Allahumma inni as'aluka min fadlik (O Allah, I ask You of Your bounty)

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقَوْلِ عِنْدَ دُخُولِ الْمَسْجِدِ وَعِنْدَ الْخُرُوجِ مِنْهُ
chapter.eng-name: What To Say When Entering And Exiting The Masjid
